abstract: Zhongsheng Group Holdings, a Chinese automobile dealer, today started testing demand for a Hong Kong initial public offering that could raise as much as $1 billion, three people with knowledge of the planned sale told Bloomberg News.
snippet: Zhongsheng Group Holdings, a Chinese automobile dealer, today started testing demand for a Hong Kong initial public offering that could raise as much as $1 billion, three people with knowledge of the planned sale told Bloomberg News.
lead_paragraph: Zhongsheng Group Holdings, a Chinese automobile dealer, today started testing demand for a Hong Kong initial public offering that could raise as much as $1 billion, three people with knowledge of the planned sale told Bloomberg News.

headline.main: China Car Dealer Zhongsheng Said to Near I.P.O.
